meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jocose or humorous.
meanings.sent1: Her constant jocosenesses always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's jocosenesses entertained the audience for hours.
meanings.sent3: His jocosenesses at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The jocosenesses in his stories brought joy to all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The jocosenesses of the clown's performance left a lasting impression.

meanings.definition: An instance of joking or jesting.
meanings.sent1: The playful jocosenesses among friends lightened the mood.
meanings.sent2: Their jocosenesses during the game added fun to the competition.
meanings.sent3: The jocosenesses between siblings made the family gatherings lively.
meanings.sent4: The jocosenesses shared between them created a bond of laughter.
meanings.sent5: In times of stress, their jocosenesses brought relief and smiles.
